title: Forum rules and getting started!
body: These are the rules of the forum! Something EVERYONE should read before use ;) Here you'll find everything you need to know to get you started on Vinted!

title: Vinted News
body: This forum section is archived and remains for information only

title: Introduce yourself!
body: Before you start, introduce yourself to other Vinted Moms :)

title: Pregnancy and birth
body: Share your experience or ask questions about pregnancy and birth here!

title: Life with...
body: Share your experience and discuss with other moms who have kids of the same age as yours. :)

title: I'm looking for... Kids' clothing and accessories
body: Are you looking for special garment for your baby or child? Here we share the items we're looking for. :)

title: Sell, Swap & Giveaway (kids category)
body: If you've got an item posted for sale in kids category, you can use this area to let other community members know about your available items. Have you got a blog, shop, or product that you would like to promote? Share it with the community here!

title: Beauty, fashion & well-being
body: This forum category is dedicated to moms who want to share their latest discoveries in sports, fashion, beauty, health & well-being. :)
